#set(BINARY ${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME}_tst)
file(GLOB_RECURSE TEST_SOURCES LIST_DIRECTORIES false *.h *.cpp)
set(SOURCES ${TEST_SOURCES})
add_executable(tilt_tst ${TEST_SOURCES})
add_test(NAME tilt_tst COMMAND tilt_tst)
# Link the lib library and gtest library generated by src
target_link_libraries(tilt_tst PUBLIC tilt_lib gtest)
